steps.text: Cut the chicken breast into 1/2 cm strips.
Slice the onion.
Slice the red pepper.
Cut the broccoli into florets.
Slice the spring onions.
Finely chop the garlic.
Grate the ginger.
To make the marinade, mix together the soy sauce, garlic and ginger, add the chicken and set aside.
Allow to marinate for 30 minutes in the fridge if you have time.
Cook the noodles according to the packet instructions.
Drain well and set aside.
Heat 1 tbsp oil in a wok or large frying pan.
Stir-fry the chicken and marinade for 2-3 minutes.
Remove from the pan and set aside.
Add 1/2 tbsp oil to the pan (if necessary) and fry the onion,spring onions, pepper and broccoli for 3-4 minutes
Add the cooked chicken and noodles and continue to stir-fry until piping hot.
Remove from the heat, add extra soy sauce to taste.
Serve immediately.
Chop the onions finely.
Cut chicken into thin strips
Slice the mushrooms.
Grate the cheese.
Slice the cucumber finely.
Follow the next steps to make the dressing:
Mix together 2 tbsp oil, the vinegar and mixed herbs.
Season with salt and pepper and set aside.
Next we make the filling:
Heat 1 tbsp oil in a frying pan and cook the chicken for 5-6 minutes(until lightly browned).
Add the mushrooms and onion, cook for 3-4 minutes.
Remove from the heat.Season with salt and pepper and mix in the grated cheese.
To make the quesadillas:
Spoon the filling evenly onto 4 tortillas and lay the remaining tortillas on top.
Heat 1 tbsp oil in the frying pan and fry the quesadillas, one at a time.
Keep on heat until the tortillas are golden and the cheese filling has melted.
Toss the salad leaves and cucumber with the dressing.
Cut the quesadillas into quarters and serve with the salad.
